title: Ranked Borders
body: If i get to silver before season 8 starts which is in january, will i get the silver border? Basically my question is, when is the deadline to secure ranked solo/duo borders? Thanks in advance!

replies.body: The deadline was the end of the season which was Nov 7th. Ranks have already been locked in, so moving up or down won't affect what rewards you get at this point.
did if i climb from~~ s4 to g3~~ maybe in preseason   did that affect my placement in s8   {{summoner:4}}  {{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}
